Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how digital sovereignty is reshaping opportunities for partners in Europe. Learn how Microsoft Sovereign Cloud empowers you to address customer concerns, unlock new business growth, and deliver secure, compliant solutions tailored to evolving customer and regulatory requirements. Gain actionable insights to help your organization thrive in the sovereign cloud era.
